mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map showing the Shenandoah Valley Railroad and its connections / J.L. Smith, successor to R.L. Barnes, map Publisher & Manufacturer, No. 27 So. 6th Street, Philadelphia Pa
Shenandoah Valley Railroad and its connections
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: G.W. & C.B. Colton & Co.
Smith, John L., 1846-1921
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by G.W. & C.B. Colton & Co. 172 William St.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 73 x 114 cm on sheet 81 x 115 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: References: rail roads finished; rail roads proposed; common roads; canals; county towns; villages & post offices.
Shows the entire state of Virginia, with connections to New York, through West Virginia and into Kentucky and Tennessee.
Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington, D.C.
